code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{ShopContext}from'../../context/shop-context';import{PRODUCTS}from'../../products';import{CartItem}from"./cart-item";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./cart.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Cart=()=>{const{cartItems,getTotalCartAmount,checkout}=useContext(ShopContext);const totalAmount=getTotalCartAmount();const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Your Cart Items"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart",children:PRODUCTS.map(product=>{if(cartItems[product.id]!==0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartItem,{data:product});}})}),totalAmount>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkout",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[" Subtotal: $",totalAmount," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/"),children:" Continue Shopping "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>{checkout();navigate("/checkout");},children:[" ","Checkout"," "]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:" Your Shopping Cart is Empty"})]});};
